select r.registerid,TO_DAYS(r.endDate)-TO_DAYS(registerDate) day,r.diagnose,r.discount,r.userName,r.age,r.sex,d.department department,r.money,c.doctorName doctorName,r.address,r.phone,r.idcard,r.registerDate,b.bedname bedName,r.operator,r.endDate,r.price,(r.money-r.price) prices from register r,departments d,doctor c,bed b
r.state=1 and r.department=d.departmentId and r.doctor=c.doctorId and r.bedNum=b.bedId
and r.userName like concat('%',concat(#{userName},'%'))
and r.registerid=#{registerid}
order by r.endDate desc
mapper.update: update register set state=1,endDate=NOW(),price=#{price} where registerid=#{registerid};
update bed set state=0 where bedid=(select bedNum from register where registerid=#{registerid})
mapper.select: select count(*) from hospitalprice where registerId=#{registerid} and state=0
